Class Universe

java.lang.Object
  Universe

public class Universe
extends Object

Universe --- program to display the universe and planets rotating around a sun Planet

Author:
Jose Romero

Constructor Summary
Universe(double endT_init, double deltaT_init, String universeFile_init)
          Constructor assigns attributes to appropriate values
 
Method Summary
 void displayUniverse()
          Displays the background and the Planet objects on the canvas
static void main(String[] args)
          Creates a Universe object, fills in the data for Planet objects, and runs a simulation of the Planet objects orbiting a sun Planet object
 void readUniverse()
          Creates an In object, ultlizing the file as its parameter, as well as setting the X and Y scale of the canvas and filling a Planet array with appropriate data
 void runSimulation()
          Runs a for loop that updates the data on the Planet objects and displays the data of the Planets on the canvas
 void updatePhysics()
          Calculates the total force applied in the X and Y direction on a Planet object and updates the X and Y position based on that data
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Constructor assigns attributes to appropriate values

Parameters:
endT_init - A double with the value to stop the simulation deltaT_init A double with the value of change in time for the simulation universeFile_init A String with the name of the text file it will use to create the Universe object * @exception

Displays the background and the Planet objects on the canvas

public static void main(String[] args)
Creates a Universe object, fills in the data for Planet objects, and runs a simulation of the Planet objects orbiting a sun Planet object

Parameters:

readUniverse

public void readUniverse()
Creates an In object, ultlizing the file as its parameter, as well as setting the X and Y scale of the canvas and filling a Planet array with appropriate data

Runs a for loop that updates the data on the Planet objects and displays the data of the Planets on the canvas

Parameters:

Calculates the total force applied in the X and Y direction on a Planet object and updates the X and Y position based on that data
